label: 践祚
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: A relatively private ceremony involving the physical transmission of the Imperial Sword and the Bead Strand, notification of the gods, and seating of the emperor on the throne. [McCullough and McCullough 1980: 394-395.]
